## IPass.setSize() method

The resize method to extend in \[\[Pass\]\] implementations. It resizes the render targets. Call on resize events.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setSize(width: number, height: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | number | Width to resize to. |
|  height | number | Height to resize to. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
